# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $100 by you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than just its face value. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose selling it to you for $125. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also acknowledges its potential to significantly enhance your experience. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
